about:
My name is Geidel Guerra. I'm a self taught developer with some formal studies, interested in low-level programming and making games.

A bit of condensed history about me: I started learning to code using Macromedia Flash 8's offline help, making a phone book app to store phone numbers of StarCraft players (back then we used dialup peer to peer connections to play using phone numbers). I did some other stuff I don't remember. Fast forward in time, after finishing school (IT Bachelor) and dropping out of University in third year (IT Engineer) my first job was making games with Unity. After that I have been developing web applications that range from simple portfolio websites to complex e-commerce multi-tenancy Saas, command line tools to automate processes, browser extensions, configuring CI pipelines and Linux servers.

I'm a fast learner (everybody says that), highly autonomous and self motivated. I have a broad set of skills that makes me easy to align to any kind of task and the will to specialize in depth if needed.

Currently learning C and how to make games. Next will be games in assembly (you read that correctly).

studies.name: Bachelor Degree, Information Technology

experience.name: Senior Software Developer
experience.description: I worked on adding unit tests to existing projects in PHP. Improved MySQL queries performance by 400%. Created new internal tools from scratch using Python, Flask, MongoDB and OpenAI to improve customer support. Created internal Chrome extension to improve staff work.

experience.name: CTO / Senior Software Developer
experience.description: I worked on Saas projects from scratch, with third-party integrations to social networks and multitenancy, using Laravel, Vue and MySQL. As CTO and Lead Programmer I was in charge of a very small team (two other developers).

experience.name: Content Manager / Maintainer
experience.description: I was in charge of the maintenance and content upload.

experience.name: Fullstack Developer
experience.description: I worked on the creation of a Saas product from scratch using Laravel, Vue and ThreeJs.

experience.name: Fullstack Developer
experience.description: I worked on the creation of the official website and internal tooling for content administration

experience.name: Videogame Developer
experience.company: Joven Club de Computación y Electrónica
experience.description: I worked on the creation of games

projects.name: Snake Game
projects.description: Snake game made in C with Raylib

projects.name: Crunchyroll Enhancer
projects.description: Browser extension that skips Crunchyroll intros and credits

projects.name: Conway's Game of Life in Python
projects.description: Python CLI Conway's Game of Life Algorithm simulation

projects.name: Klipers Saas
projects.description: A Saas made from 0 to production, I worked on the UI, adding integrations with third party APIs like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, server configuration and deployment. Tech used: Laravel + InertiaJs + TailwindCSS. Hosted on AWS with Laravel Vapor

projects.name: Contegy Saas
projects.description: A Saas made from 0 to production. I worked on the UI, adding multi-tenant architecture,  integrations with third party APIs like Facebook, Instagram, Google Analytics, Twitter, LinkedIn, server configuration and deployment. Tech used: Laravel + InertiaJs + TailwindCSS. Hosted on AWS with Laravel Forge and Envoyer

projects.name: Tenza Website
projects.description: Official website for Tenza Studio with some cool 3D animations and a 3D viewer. Tech used: NuxtJs + TailwindCSS + ThreeJs + AnimeJs and Lottie. Hosted on Netlify

projects.name: Alberto Hernandez Reyes Personal Website
projects.description: Official website for a Cuban painter. Tech used: NuxtJs + TailwindCSS. Hosted on Netlify

projects.name: La Tinta Magazine Website
projects.description: Official website for the first body art magazine in Cuba. Tech used: NuxtJs + TailwindCSS. Hosted on Netlify

projects.name: PlaceArt Website
projects.description: A Saas for selling art online. A work on the frontend, backend, 3D viewer for art showcase and server configuration and deployment. Tech used: NuxtJs + Laravel + ThreeJs + AFrame

projects.name: Fábrica de Arte Cubano Website
projects.description: Official website. I worked on the frontend and backend (with a custom programming of events's calendar and editor). Tech used: Laravel 5 + Bootstrap + jQuery

projects.name: Gráfica Interactiva II (with Serones Art Group)
projects.description: A collaboration with the cuban art group called Serones. I was tasked with the coding of the 3D navigation system, event triggers and illumination. Tech used: Unity3D
